meaning_str.bing:
prep. 紧邻；在…近旁；仅次于；紧接
网络. 在…旁边；紧挨着；与……相邻

紧邻；在…近旁；仅次于；紧接

紧靠着；紧挨着；紧邻；紧接；在…旁边；在…近旁；与…相比；仅次于

1.en: Sitting down carefully next to Kaleb, Johannah pressed a finger into his abdomen, which was well defined and gorgeous, like the rest of him.
1.cn: 旁边坐下来仔细卡莱布，约翰纳塞到他的腹部，这是明确和华丽喜欢他的其余部分，用手指。

2.en: But that would have made next to no difference to the outcome, unless it had been able to generate a large surplus in net assets.
2.cn: 但那几乎对结局没有什么影响——除非它能够产生巨额的净资产盈余。

3.en: "Every woman in the front row was a child sitting next to a fat old man, " one insider laughed afterwords.
3.cn: “每一个女人在前排还是个孩子坐在旁边的一个胖老头，”一位内部人士笑了后记。

0.en: And who're you gonna be sitting next to?
0.cn: 再看看你旁边坐的是谁？

1.en: That's who you're gonna be sitting next to!
1.cn: 那就是坐在你旁边的人。

2.en: Buzz, mind if I squeeze in next to you?
2.cn: 巴斯，你介意我挤在你旁边吗?

3.en: He never used to cry. He just used to sit next to me and cuddle.
3.cn: 他以前从来不哭，他只会坐在我旁边，靠着我。

4.en: And he's standing next to this cow, and the cow says, "Elmoo."
4.cn: 阿母站在牛旁边，牛说了：阿母-母-母-母。

5.en: Sure. Sure, I'll just sit next to the trans-sexual from purchasing.
5.cn: 是啊，是啊，我会坐在采购部那个变性人旁边。

6.en: Don't worry. Just sit next to me during the quiz and you can copy my answers.
6.cn: 别担心，测试时坐我旁边，你可以抄我的。

7.en: Imagine you're at a football game when this obnoxious guy sits next to you.
7.cn: 想象你在看一场足球赛旁边坐着一个讨厌鬼。

8.en: I'm gonna move my club house there, and park it right next to the falls.
8.cn: 我要把俱乐部搬到那里，把它安置在瀑布的旁边。

9.en: But I was thinking that I'd like to bring you up to my area, next to Becky.
9.cn: 而是我在想，可以把你调到我的工作区域，坐在贝琪旁边。

10.en: Because they lived next to it so long. Maybe they forgot what it was.
10.cn: 因为他们在火山旁边住了很久，可能久到已经忘了它是座火山了。

11.en: You sat next to me on that bucket, you talked to me, I talked back to you? Yeah. Yeah.
11.cn: 你就坐在我旁边的木桶上，你跟我说话，我也跟你说话。嗯。是啊。

12.en: Yes. No. I mean, why would I mind if I squeeze... squeeze in next to you?
12.cn: 是的，不，我是说，我怎么会介意挤... 挤在你... 旁边呢?

13.en: You, one eye, You're sitting next to me. Okay. I'm going. Stuart. Just get on.
13.cn: 你，一只眼的，你要坐在我旁边。好吧，我走了。斯图尔特，上车吧。

14.en: Green Park and St. James's Park are right next to Buckingham Palace, Admiralty Arch and The Mall.
14.cn: 绿园和圣詹姆斯公园就在白金汉宫、海军拱门和林荫路的旁边。

15.en: How can you possibly know that? Because I just tracked down our new number, and she's sitting right next to you.
15.cn: 你怎么会知道？因为我刚刚追踪到新号码了，她就坐在你旁边。

16.en: The manager recognized Wil and let us sit right next to the frozen yogurt machine. Right next to it. I was closer to it than I am to you right now.
16.cn: 餐厅经理认出了威尔，同意让我们坐在冰酸奶机旁呢，正旁边哦，比我现在跟你的距离还近呢。

17.en: Yeah. Did I say anything important? Didn't matter what you said. It was that you sat there next to me.
17.cn: 是啊，我说了什么重要的事吗？你说了什么不重要，就是你坐在我旁边。

18.en: Users with the most visited threads are rewarded with online icons that appear next to their names.
18.cn: 帖子访问量最高的用户会获得奖赏，即显示在用户名旁边的一个网络图标。

19.en: Open Ocean! I know where that is. That's the exhibit located right next to... I don't care. Easy!
19.cn: 大洋区！我知道它在哪里。那个展览馆旁边就是 ... 我才不在乎。别激动！
